description:
Isshiki Kenjirou is the grandfather of Akane and Momo and self-proclaimed mad scientist. He is one of the developers of the Manifestation Engine, but now he keeps a research lab in Ooshima Izu and focuses on his inventions. He pours most of his money into his research, which is one reason why the Isshiki family is poor.
Source: wiki
name: Isshiki Kenjirou
